vocabulary.description: Has the ability to use common, introductory words and phrases to express oneself.
Has a growing vocabulary of daily, common words and expressions that can be used in everyday situations.
Has fundamental vocabulary of individual terms and phrases about specific, everyday situations.
Has a continuously expanding basic set of words and phrases for commonplace, everyday situations.
Possesses rudimentary vocabulary terms and phrases pertaining to personal information and fundamental practical needs.
Displays a foundational vocabulary for addressing personal details and basic needs that is working towards having sufficient knowledge in these aspects.
Demonstrates satisfactory vocabulary with fundamental communication and essential survival situations.
Adequately addresses fundamental communication and survival needs while building the vocabulary needed for common, intermediate interactions about familiar subjects.
Possesses solid vocabulary for handling regular, everyday interactions about common subjects.
Has adequate vocabulary for dealing with familiar and routine subjects, with ongoing vocabulary development for a broader range of daily life topics.
Shows a satisfactory vocabulary foundation to communicate about topics such as personal interests, career, travel, and recent news with some rephrasing needed.
Is capable of handling regular, familiar interactions and topics with the aim of achieving greater competency.
Exhibits functional, practical vocabulary and can navigate known conversation topics and commonplace events with relative ease.

Has developed a broad vocabulary for familiar topics and regular situations, aiming towards using advanced and/or natural language in their respective professional field and other specialized fields of interest.
Uses much of the specific and natural language across a variety of contexts and topics, especially within subject matter where a level of expertise within the domain has been sought after.

Demonstrates the ability to use much of the specific and natural language across areas within their field and interests. Is working on acquiring proficiency in using technical and natural terminology in other unfamiliar subjects, specialized and broad.
Maintains a strong grasp of key technical terms and natural language for both specialized and general, everyday subjects.
Currently improving upon using less descriptive language and evasion techniques and more technical and natural language when using vocabulary across all subject matter.
Exhibits a rich lexicon that enables speaking and discussing any topic smoothly with ease; little to no issues with deriving, recalling, and utilizing language with precision and accuracy.

Has a sophisticated lexical range and verbal arsenal that allows speaking of general and complex subjects with little to no difficulty, with aspirations of speaking identically to that of a native speaker in terms of modern natural language, colloquial expressions, and slang.

grammar.description: Grasps basic question and subject-verb-object patterns.
Shows the ability to correctly arrange words in simple, short sentences and is working towards understanding and using an increasing range of grammar structures.
Understands a narrow range of familiar, introductory grammar rules and fundamental sentence patterns.
Is progressing towards increasing the range of learnt grammar structures and sentence patterns in short, clear sentences.
Demonstrates control of a limited amount of familiar basic grammar rules and sentence structure.
Is moving towards acquiring higher accuracy towards learnt grammar and sentence patterns while maintaining coherence. Has increased comfortability in describing actions and states.
Can further enhance accuracy in introductory grammar and sentence structures. While elementary mistakes are present, frequent confusion or misunderstanding is rare.
Is working on continuous improvement of grammar and sentence pattern correctness for consistent coherence. Is starting to use more complex forms.

Has made progress in introductory grammar and sentence structure, with room to further refine accuracy. It is uncommon to have significant clarity and coherence issues for fundamental English mistakes.
Has increased accuracy of basic grammar and sentence structure usage with further accuracy improvement needed. Is becoming more experienced in using common, routine grammar and sentence patterns.
Effectively applies familiar routine and sentence pattern sets in expected scenarios while being fairly accurate. Is in the process of refining their understanding of intermediate grammar concepts.

Is moving towards consistently expressing thoughts clearly in well-known contexts more accurately while limiting native language influences. Is beginning to develop a good grasp of intermediate-level grammar.
Expresses ideas clearly in known situations despite some recognition of native language influences. Clarity is maintained in spite of occasional mistakes.
Is handling basic, routine situations well and is starting to use more advanced grammar and sentence forms while continuing to build upon flexibility and accuracy in using complex structures.
Handles basic, routine structures confidently and is in the process of incorporating more advanced grammar and sentence forms with precision and versatility.
Is improving upon understanding and execution of more advanced grammar concepts. Is able to self-correct and has a good control of intermediate and advanced grammar concepts and sentence patterns.
Has control over grammar and sentence structures with minor inconsistencies being infrequent. Consistent self-correction occurs when these inconsistencies are present.
Commands a wide range of natural and advanced grammatical structures in which self-correction is possible for inconsequential mistakes. Is in the process of achieving near-perfect accuracy.
Demonstrates grammar fluency of a wide range of grammar structures with accuracy and relevance by recognizing nuances and subtle distinctions between contexts, tones, and formalities.

Is demonstrating complete control of all aspects of grammar. Is in the process of mastery of being versatile and adaptable with grammar in different contexts, tones, and formalities with precision and clarity.

pronunciation.description: Exhibits an accent with distinct native language influences on the targeted language, making comprehension challenging at times.
Pronunciation includes a noticeable accent and requires enunciation of key phonetic sounds. Is working towards clear articulation of basic phonetic sounds and general words in short form.
Pronunciation of a small set of familiar words are recognized with some effort by native speakers accustomed to various accents. Basic stress patterns and enunciation are becoming more apparent.

Is understanding and increasing the accuracy of short phonetic combinations. Intonation is beginning to become apparent when speaking. Able to be understood by native speakers with experience with the speaker, but effort is required at times.

Increased occasions of using the appropriate simple and common phonetic sounds. The learner is able to use intonation more often for common, routine words and phrases. Effort is needed by native speakers to fully understand what has been said at times.
Pronunciation has improved to the point of being understood despite a noticeable accent. Being asked to repeat spoken words occurs often but has been steadily decreasing.

Pronunciation typically has enough phonetic and intonational correctness to be understood in spite of a foreign accent being apparent. Repetition may be asked at times because of more advanced phonetic sounds, stress, and intonation of unfamiliar words.
Is understanding and practicing the principles of basic word stress, intonation, and rhythm to better communicate familiar information with a higher frequency of intelligibility.

Is beginning to grasp the use of chunking and pausing within their speech to better increase understanding. Basic foundational pronunciation aspects are being improved upon such that being asked to repeat because of those aspects are decreasing.
Is in the process of becoming generally intelligible, where basic to intermediate level phonics, intonation, and stress are more evident despite native language influences.
Native language influences on pronunciation, although apparent, have generally decreased. Is having a stronger grasp of using speaking rhythm: pausing, chunking, word, and sentence stress.
Is in the process of further improving pronunciation accuracy of learnt concepts to decrease the situations of misunderstandings or confusion.

Accuracy of familiar and common pronunciations have increased through a better understanding of introductory to intermediate pronunciation techniques such as stress, intonation, phonics, chunking, and pausing.
Is achieving a better comprehension and execution of pronunciation concepts such as stress, intonation, phonics, chunking, and pausing while decreasing native language impact on intelligibility.
Intonation and stress are generally used well, though the accent reflects native language influences, with minimal impact on clarity.
Is having a deeper understanding of connected speech and linking to have better spoken word flow. Is focusing on continuous improvement of common and uncommon intonation and stress.
Uses intonation and stress effectively. Pronunciation remains clear and is articulated well. Accent has little or no effect on clarity.
Demonstrates the ability to use most pronunciation concepts effortlessly with little inaccuracies. Advanced forms of pronunciation such as vocal projection are being practiced and improved upon.
Maintains complete control over phonological concepts to maintain clear conversation. Most sounds are articulated with high accuracy and precision.
Is aspiring to have complete mastery as to that of a native speaker. Advanced forms of pronunciation such as vocal projection and tone are being perfected.

listening.description: Can identify basic sounds and simple words that are a part of everyday language, provided that it is spoken slowly and enunciated clearly.
Can determine common, familiar words when spoken slowly and clearly in everyday situations. Is working on picking out specific details on familiar topics.
Able to identify common intonation patterns and simple stress in words. Uses context and visual clues to grasp basic meanings and clear phrases, provided that it is delivered in a slow and clear way.
Is in the process of keeping up with speech that is slow and well-articulated, with speaking pauses to process the information.
Is able to understand slow and clear speech that provides time for comprehension. Is beginning to distinguish clear stress patterns, simple intonation, and focus on context to understand.

Is developing an understanding of phrases and expressions related to important speaking situations, such as personal and familial information, provided that speech is articulated in a clear and slow way.
Has a better understanding of intonation and stress such that essential phrases related to immediate concerns are more easily comprehended.
Is experimenting with segmenting spoken words into more understandable segments, provided that speech is clear and slow.
Can grasp sufficient details to meet specific needs when speech is clear and slow.

Is familiarizing oneself with chunking to comprehend main points when topics are spoken at a moderately slow speed. Is beginning to understand the key points of common, daily life topics such as work, school, leisure, and small talk.
Comprehends the key points of common, routine matters related to career, schooling, interests, and small talk.
Is becoming able to listen at a moderate speed to understand daily life and general work-related dialogue. Is starting to become accustomed to listening to unfamiliar accents.

Has the ability to comprehend general work and daily life-related topics. Is becoming more adept at identifying main points and nuances within the speech. Able to listen to a native speaker at a moderately fast speed.

Has made progress in understanding detailed information and complex arguments in various contexts. Is improving upon using context and chunking to follow discussions with diverse accents and faster speech.

Grasps key points of complex discussions on a variety of topics, including technical content in their area of expertise when spoken to during regular conversation. Is able to listen to a native speaker at a fast speed.
Is moving towards understanding the main ideas in detailed speech on both common and specialized topics. Is progressing towards comprehension of broader discussions in various contexts.

Demonstrated the ability to comprehend spoken communication on a variety of topics that are commonly or uncommonly encountered in everyday, academic, or work situations. Has the ability to listen to a native speaker at near-native speed.

Is in the process of grasping lengthy spoken content across various subjects by utilizing advanced listening skills and contextual clues to discern main points and subtle details. Is becoming accustomed to listening at native speed, of a variety of native accents, with the occasional need for clarification.

Has the ability to comprehend spoken language at native speed. Can better interpret the main points and nuances of complex and detailed matters outside of primary knowledge areas. Occasional clarification is still needed at times, particularly when accents differ greatly from the learner’s listening experiences.

Is becoming more able to follow and interpret lengthy discourse beyond familiar areas. Is progressing towards mastery of advanced listening techniques to grasp nuanced arguments, intricate details, and varied accents with ease.

conversation.description: Asks and answers questions about personal details and daily activities, using brief, short phrases and supportive non-verbal gestures.
Accustoming oneself to exchanges in basic, short interactions. Is reliant on repetition, slower speech, and rephrasing to maintain understanding.

Engages in basic interaction, with communication relying heavily on repetition, slower speech, and restating information. Is able to use simple speaking structures to express basic needs and preferences.
Is able to construct basic sentences to convey information. Is working on providing more detailed answers and formulating appropriate, introductory questions.
Handles straightforward, common conversations with an emphasis on enhancing communication by practicing repetition and adjusting speech rate for better understanding.
Is progressing towards better participation in straightforward exchanges while handling simple speaking tasks and direct information sharing in familiar situations.
Manages basic tasks and exchanges related to routine work and leisure. Handles very brief social interactions effectively.
Is linking ideas in longer sentences and relating events in a sequence of basic descriptions. Is starting to show confidence in starting and having conversations on familiar topics.
Engages comfortably in structured interactions and brief conversations with some assistance when appropriate. Has the ability to share thoughts on familiar topics in everyday settings.
Is practicing navigating conversations on familiar topics with ease by sharing personal information and daily matters in more structured sentences, even without prior preparation.
Can actively join spontaneous conversations on familiar topics, share personal insights, and discuss everyday matters. Able to ask for clarity, clarify, and paraphrase to ensure understanding.
Is starting to be more comfortable speaking about both regular and less familiar personal and professional subject matter, including confirming and exchanging information in various contexts.

Communicates relatively smoothly on a range of familiar and less common topics related to personal and professional areas while managing conversations with some ease and verifying details when needed.
Is moving towards sustaining longer, more complex conversations on a wide range of topics. Is working on effective presentation and defense of viewpoints with appropriate language structures.
Contributes in conversation with a comfortable flow that ensures natural exchanges and meaningful, sustained interactions with speakers of the targeted language without added effort.

Participates in discussion with fluency and spontaneity while adjusting to different levels of formality when needed. Is becoming more practiced in telling detailed stories, explaining processes clearly, and convincing others with well-structured arguments and reasoning.
Expresses thoughts and ideas freely and accurately, adapting the level of formality as needed while sustaining linguistic accuracy.

Is approaching fluent and natural communication with a strong grasp of language structure and formality. Is progressing towards being adept at expressing subtle distinctions, handling abstract and complex topics, and using advanced speaking techniques.
Handles diverse topics with confidence, using language flexibly and accurately to convey ideas without effort, adjusting tone and formality as needed.

Is progressing towards fluency in spontaneous conversation on any topic with ease. Is at the level where continuous learning and incorporation of cultural references and idioms naturally is needed. Is becoming more practiced in handling abstract, complex arguments with precision and depth.

vocabulary.description: 無學習華語經驗。
大致知道些許常見入門單詞，例如:你好、謝謝。
能掌握自我介紹相關的入門單詞和短句。
能辨別出日常生活中與個人切身相關的高頻詞彙，並逐漸能在日常情境中使用。
能理解日常生活中所使用的高頻詞彙或短語，並能應對特定的日常情境。
日常常見的基本單詞和短句逐漸累積中。
能理解與個人切身相關的單詞，並能簡單地表達自身需求。
能掌握部分的單詞來表達基本的溝通需求或應對簡單的生存需求，並且逐漸累積詞彙量中。
具備足夠的單字量來表達基本的溝通需求及應對簡單的生存需求。
能夠充分解決基本溝通和生存需求，並逐漸累積中級交流所需的詞彙。
擁有充足的詞彙量來應對常規的日常交流和常見話題。
擁有足夠的詞彙量來應對熟悉和日常的主題，並持續擴展更多的詞彙來處理更廣泛的日常生活話題。
對日常生活中切身相關的主題（如：個人興趣、職業、旅行和時事)，有足夠的字彙量表達自己的想法，但仍可能有部分需要改變敘述方式。
能夠處理常規、熟悉的交流和話題，目標是往更高的語言程度邁進。
展現實用詞彙，能夠較為輕鬆地應對熟悉的對話主題和日常情境。
已具備豐富詞彙，能夠應對熟悉的話題和日常情境，並逐步朝向在專業領域或個人興趣領域運用高階且自然的語言邁進。
在各種情境和話題中能使用許多具體且自然的單詞，特別是能理解自己專業領域中所使用的詞彙。
能夠在自身領域和興趣範圍內運用大量具體且自然的語言能力，並且積極提升在陌生領域中使用專業術語和自然表達的熟練度。
在專業與日常主題中，能夠熟練掌握專業術語並自然運用。
能夠避免使用含糊不清的表達或替代說法，更加熟練地運用專業且自然的詞彙。
展現出豐富的詞彙量，能夠流暢討論任何話題，並精準運用語言，幾乎不會出現障礙。
擁有不同領域的詞彙量，能夠輕鬆討論一般話題與複雜主題，並致力於在現代詞彙、口語表達及俚語運用上達到母語者水平。

grammar.description: 無學習華語經驗。
大致知道些許常見入門短句，例如:我是(國家)人、我喜歡...。
掌握基本的疑問句和主謂賓結構。
能夠正確排列簡單短句中的單詞，並逐步理解與運用越來越多的語法結構。
能理解常見入門語法規則與基本句型。
語法結構與句型的掌握正在進步，學習範圍不斷擴展，並能在簡短且清晰的句子中加以運用。
能夠熟練運用範圍有限的基本語法與句子結構。
能夠越來越準確地運用所學的語法與句型，對描述動作與狀態的表達變得更加順暢。
能夠正確運用入門級語法和句型，雖仍會出現基本錯誤，但大致能避免混淆或誤解。
能夠更準確地運用語法與句型，並開始使用較為複雜的語法結構。
在初級語法與句子結構上有所進步，但仍有提升準確性的空間。基本錯誤不至於嚴重影響句子的連貫性。
基本語法與句子結構的準確度有所提升，但仍需進一步精進，並逐漸熟悉日常語法與句型的運用。
能夠熟練運用常見的固定表達與句型，且整體較為準確，並正在加深對中級語法的理解。
在熟悉的情境中，能夠較穩定且更精確地表達自身想法，同時減少母語影響。此外，已開始扎實理解中級語法。
在熟悉的情境中，雖然仍受到一些母語影響，但能清楚表達想法。偶爾出現錯誤，但仍易於理解。
能夠熟練應對日常情境，並開始運用更高階的語法與句型。此外，對於較複雜的句構能夠更加靈活且準確地運用。
能夠自信地運用基本的固定表達，並逐步準確且靈活地融入更高階的語法與句型。
能夠理解並運用更高階的語法，並熟練掌握中級至高級語法與句型，能夠有意識地修正錯誤。
能夠充分掌握語法與句子結構，偶爾出現細微錯誤，但能夠穩定地自行修正。
能夠靈活運用多樣且自然的表達方式與高階語法結構，並能自行修正細微錯誤，致力於達到近乎完美的準確度。
能夠流暢運用複雜的語法結構，並理解語境、語調與形式的細微差異，且能夠恰當地加以運用。
能夠掌控高級語法，並精確且熟練地根據不同語境、語調與表達形式加以運用，逐步達到母語者平。

pronunciation.description: 無學習華語經驗。
曾學習過拼音但尚未穩定掌握拼音組合與聲調。
發音與聲調深受母語影響，經常導致理解困難。
發音帶有明顯的口音，仍需練習以掌握正確發音。同時，正在專注於拼音組合及穩定聲調的練習。
熟悉的部分單詞能夠被習慣各種口音的母語者大致理解。此外，基本的聲調與發音逐漸變得更加準確與穩定。
能夠掌握拼音，並逐漸提升發音與聲調穩定度。表達開始變得清晰，對母語者而言，大致能夠理解，但有時仍需重複。
能夠更準確地發音，日常單詞與短語的表達變得更加清晰，但母語者在理解時可能仍會遇到些許困難。
發音已經有所進步，即使有明顯的口音，也能被理解。要求重複的情況變得更少。
發音大致準確與穩定，即使帶有外國口音，大多數情況下仍能被理解。然而，對於不熟悉的陌生單詞，可能仍會被要求重複。
正在理解並練習基本的語調與斷句，能夠更清楚地傳達熟悉的資訊，並提升口語表達的理解度。
開始掌握斷句與停頓，使表達更清晰易懂。基本發音能力亦有所提升，被要求重複的情況逐漸減少。
正處於可理解度逐步提升的階段，基礎至中級程度的聲調組合、語調變得更加清晰，但仍受到母語影響。
儘管母語對發音的影響仍然明顯，但已有所減少。對發音的掌握更為穩定，包括能意識停頓、分段位置。
發音正在進一步提升與穩定，從而減少對母語者的誤解或混淆情況。
對聲調掌握、語調、停頓等入門至中級的發音技巧有更深入的理解，熟悉的單詞與常見發音的準確性有所提升。」
對聲調掌握、語調、停頓等入門至中級的發音技巧有更好的掌握。同時，母語影響減少，使發音更易於理解。」
語調和重音通常使用得當，儘管口音反映了母語影響，但對清晰度的影響最小。
發音大致良好，口音仍受到母語影響，但整體表達準確，幾乎不會造成溝通困難。
能夠掌握語調，發音清晰且準確。即使仍帶有母語口音，但幾乎不影響理解。
能夠自然掌握大部分的發音，幾乎沒有錯誤。逐漸有高級學習者的表現。
完全掌握發音，對話理解度清晰準確。
完全掌握發音，致力於像母語者一樣的語調與表現。

listening.description: 無學習華語經驗。
能大致理解入門單詞和短句。
在語速較慢且發音清晰的前提下，能夠辨識入門單詞與短句。
在日常情境中，如果對方說話速度較慢且發音清晰，能夠聽懂熟悉的單詞。正在練習理解熟悉話題的細節資訊。
能區分聲調差異及常見語境下的語調，如果說話者速度較慢且發音清晰，能夠利用上下文和視覺線索來掌握基本含義。
能區分聲調差異及常見語境下的語調，如果說話者速度較慢且發音清晰，能夠利用上下文和視覺線索來掌握基本含義。
能理解語速較慢且清晰的資訊，並能有足夠的時間來理解，並專注於利用語境來理解。
當發音清晰且語速較慢時，能夠理解個人或家庭相關資訊等重要對話情境中使用的短句和表達。
對語調和聲調的掌握逐漸穩定，日常生活中常用的重要表達變得更容易聽懂。
當說話者語速較慢時，為了更能理解資訊，正在嘗試把資訊分割成更容易理解的單詞或短句。
能夠聽懂清晰且語速較慢的內容，並充分掌握所需的細節資訊。
正在熟悉將資訊區分成慣用語塊來理解重點，在說話者以中等速度說話的前提下，能理解工作、學校、休閒和日常對話。
能夠理解與工作、學校、興趣以及日常生活等常見主題的重要內容。
能夠理解日常生活和工作相關的對話，即使語速適中，也能掌握。並適應不同的口音。
具備理解與工作或日常生活相關話題的能力。能夠更準確地辨識對話重點和語氣差異，並且能適應母語者的語速。
能夠理解各種情境中的詳細資訊和較複雜的內容。面對不同的口音或較快的語速，也能透過語境和上下文理解對話。
能夠理解各種主題和複雜內容。在一般語速下，能理解與自身專業領域相關的內容。此外，還能理解母語者以較快語速進行的對話。
不僅能理解日常話題，還能掌握專業領域的主要內容。對各種情境下的對話理解能力正在進一步提升。
除了日常和工作相關話題外，對不太熟悉的話題也能理解。能夠理解以母語者語速進行的對話。
